************
Introduction
************

roipy is a set of python classes and modules for working with ROI_PAC data. 
`ROI_PAC <http://www.roipac.org/>`_ is open source processing code for InSAR. 


Getting Started
---------------

Basic usage involves importing roipy (preferrably from `iPython <http://ipython.org/>`_) ::

        $ import roipy as rp

Then rp. tab complete to get an idea of what you can do
